description:
Maelstrom is an authentic webOS version of the classic Mac & PC game.   Maelstrom takes asteroids to a whole new level with great graphics, many bonus opportunities, edgy sound effects, and just all around attitude.  Many game levels and power ups to explore.
This WebOS version uses the accelerometer for a controller, so tilting left or right will rotate your ship Left or Right.   Tipping forward activates thrust and tipping back activates the shields.  Tap the screen to fire.  You can also use the customizable keyboard commands.  
Enjoy.  Webos version based on Maelstrom 3.0.6 under GNU GPLv2.
